data.subTitle: base64转换为blob
data.content:
/**
 * base64转换为blob
 * @param {*} dataurl base64
 */
export const dataURLtoBlob = (dataurl) => {
 let arr = dataurl.split(','),
  mime = arr[0].match(/:(.*?);/)[1],
  bstr = atob(arr[1]),
  n = bstr.length,
  u8arr = new Uint8Array(n);
 while (n--) {
  u8arr[n] = bstr.charCodeAt(n);
 }
 return new Blob([u8arr], { type: mime });
}
